verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Again, you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H376>Whoever<s%> he be of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> or of the <S%H1616>strangers<s%> that <S%H1481>sojourn<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> that <S%H5414>gives<s%> any of his <S%H2233>seed<s%> to <S%H4432>Molech;<s%> he shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death:<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> him with <S%H68>stones.<s%>

And I will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against that <S%H376>man,<s%> and will <S%H3772>cut<s%> him off from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he has <S%H5414>given<s%> of his <S%H2233>seed<s%> to <S%H4432>Molech,<s%> to <S%H2930>defile<s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> and to <S%H2490>profane<s%> my <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H8034>name.<s%>

And <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> do any ways <S%H5956>hide<s%> their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> from the <S%H376>man,<s%> when he <S%H5414>gives<s%> of his <S%H2233>seed<s%> to <S%H4432>Molech,<s%> and <S%H4191>kill<s%> him not:

Then I will <S%H7760>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against that <S%H376>man,<s%> and against his <S%H4940>family,<s%> and will <S%H3772>cut<s%> him off, and <S%H3605>all<s%> that go a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> him, to <S%H2181>commit<s%> <S%H2181>prostitution<s%> with <S%H4432>Molech,<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> their <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And the <S%H5315>soul<s%> that <S%H6437>turns<s%> <S%H413>after<s%> such as have familiar <S%H178>spirits,<s%> and <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3049>wizards,<s%> to go a <S%H2181>whoring<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them, I will even <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> against that <S%H5315>soul,<s%> and will <S%H3772>cut<s%> him off from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>
<S%H6942>Sanctify<s%> yourselves therefore, and be you <S%H6918>holy:<s%> for I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>
And you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them: I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> which <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> you.

For <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> that <S%H7043>curses<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> or his <S%H517>mother<s%> shall be surely put to <S%H4191>death:<s%> he has <S%H7043>cursed<s%> his <S%H1>father<s%> or his <S%H517>mother;<s%> his <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be on him.

And the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H5003>commits<s%> <S%H5003>adultery<s%> with <S%H376>another<s%> <S%H376>man's<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> even he that <S%H5003>commits<s%> <S%H5003>adultery<s%> with his <S%H7453>neighbor's<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> the <S%H5003>adulterer<s%> and the <S%H5003>adulteress<s%> shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

And the <S%H376>man<s%> that <S%H7901>lies<s%> with his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> has <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H6172>nakedness:<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death;<s%> their <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be on them.

And <S%H834>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H7901>lie<s%> with his <S%H3618>daughter<s%> in <S%H3618>law,<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death:<s%> they have <S%H6213>worked<s%> <S%H8397>confusion;<s%> their <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be on them.

<S%H834>If<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> also <S%H7901>lie<s%> with <S%H2145>mankind,<s%> as he <S%H4904>lies<s%> with a <S%H802>woman,<s%> <S%H8147>both<s%> of them have <S%H6213>committed<s%> an <S%H8441>abomination:<s%> they shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death;<s%> their <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be on them.

And <S%H834>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> and her <S%H517>mother,<s%> it is <S%H2154>wickedness:<s%> they shall be <S%H8313>burnt<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> both he and they; that there be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2154>wickedness<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> you.
And <S%H834>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H5414>lie<s%> <S%H7903><s%> with a <S%H929>beast,<s%> he shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death:<s%> and you shall <S%H2026>slay<s%> the <S%H929>beast.<s%>

And <S%H834>if<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H7126>approach<s%> to <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H929>beast,<s%> and <S%H7250>lie<s%> <S%H7250>down<s%> thereto, you shall <S%H2026>kill<s%> the <S%H802>woman,<s%> and the <S%H929>beast:<s%> they shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death;<s%> their <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be on them.

And <S%H834>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> his <S%H269>sister,<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> his <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and <S%H7200>see<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness,<s%> and she <S%H7200>see<s%> his <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> it is a <S%H2617>wicked<s%> thing; and they shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of their <S%H1121>people:<s%> <S%H5971><s%> he has <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H269>sister's<s%> <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> he shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> his <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

And <S%H834>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> with a <S%H802>woman<s%> having her <S%H1739>sickness,<s%> and shall <S%H1540>uncover<s%> her <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> he has <S%H6168>discovered<s%> her <S%H4726>fountain,<s%> and she has <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> the <S%H4726>fountain<s%> of her <S%H1818>blood:<s%> and <S%H8147>both<s%> of them shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from <S%H7130>among<s%> their <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And you shall not <S%H1540>uncover<s%> the <S%H6172>nakedness<s%> of your <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H269>sister,<s%> nor of your <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H269>sister:<s%> for he <S%H6168>uncovers<s%> his <S%H7607>near<s%> <S%H7607>kin:<s%> they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H5771>iniquity.<s%>

And <S%H834>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H7901>lie<s%> with his <S%H1733>uncle's<s%> <S%H1733>wife,<s%> he has <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H1730>uncle's<s%> <S%H6172>nakedness:<s%> they shall <S%H5375>bear<s%> their <S%H2399>sin;<s%> they shall <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H6185>childless.<s%>

And <S%H834>if<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> shall <S%H3947>take<s%> his <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H802>wife,<s%> it is an <S%H5079>unclean<s%> thing: he has <S%H1540>uncovered<s%> his <S%H251>brother's<s%> <S%H6172>nakedness;<s%> they shall be <S%H6185>childless.<s%>

You shall therefore <S%H8104>keep<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> my <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> and <S%H6213>do<s%> them: that the <S%H776>land,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I <S%H935>bring<s%> you to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein, <S%H6958>spew<s%> you not out.

And you shall not <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H2708>manners<s%> of the <S%H1471>nation,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7971>cast<s%> out <S%H6440>before<s%> you: for they <S%H6213>committed<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> things, and therefore I <S%H6973>abhorred<s%> them.

But I have <S%H559>said<s%> to you, You shall <S%H3423>inherit<s%> their <S%H127>land,<s%> and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> it to you to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, a <S%H776>land<s%> that <S%H2100>flows<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey:<s%> I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have <S%H914>separated<s%> you from other <S%H5971>people.<s%>

You shall therefore put <S%H914>difference<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H929>beasts<s%> and <S%H2931>unclean,<s%> and <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H5775>fowls<s%> and <S%H2889>clean:<s%> and you shall not make your <S%H5315>souls<s%> <S%H8262>abominable<s%> by <S%H929>beast,<s%> or by <S%H5775>fowl,<s%> or by <S%H3605>any<s%> manner of living thing that <S%H7430>creeps<s%> on the <S%H127>ground,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H914>separated<s%> from you as <S%H2930>unclean.<s%>
And you shall be <S%H6918>holy<s%> to me: for I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> am <S%H6918>holy,<s%> and have <S%H914>severed<s%> you from other <S%H5971>people,<s%> that you should be mine.

A <S%H376>man<s%> also <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H802>woman<s%> that <S%H1961>has<s%> a familiar <S%H178>spirit,<s%> or that is a <S%H3049>wizard,<s%> shall surely be put to <S%H4191>death:<s%> they shall <S%H7275>stone<s%> them with <S%H68>stones:<s%> their <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be on them.
